Text.Page:
The tree planting over in the {@Rgn:47015#Spore Emitter Zone} was going fine until we ran into the argon faeries.

Yeah, that's what I said. {@Creature:47#2002#argon faeries}.

It gets worse. You need to kill them.
I despised argons anyway, but if it's possible to hate them even more for doing that to faeries, then I do. Thanks, <PCNAME>.
